content:
- [ ] telling sweet and beautiful stories (circa the happy prince )
- [ ] doing karaoke together 
- [ ] conversational exercises aimed at touching heart 
- [ ] sharing and making stupid requests out loud together
- [ ] topical question Bank pick a question everyone answers and engages with each other's answers co-discussion activity
